title: Fix Timezone Display for Pause End Date
message: QA verified timezone display feature. PM please review the timezone formatting in pause modal and paused account banner.

magic_links.what_pm_sees: Billing page with paused account banner showing 'Your subscription will automatically resume on Jan 12, 2026 at 8:24 PM MST'

test_setup: Admin user's account is paused for 1 month. Banner displays resume date with explicit timezone abbreviation (MST).
acceptance_criteria: Users can clearly see what timezone the pause end date uses
No confusion about when account will actually resume
Date display is consistent across all billing UI
key_findings: ✅ formatDateWithTimezone() helper correctly formats dates with timezone abbreviation
✅ Timezone displayed in pause modal for all duration options (1, 2, 3 months)
✅ Explanatory text 'All times shown in your local timezone' present
✅ Date updates dynamically when duration changes
✅ Consistent format across all UI locations
pm_action_required: Review UI timezone display via magic link. Verify the format is clear and resolves F-064 confusion.
